show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #43 Sage Askin "Longevity Needs Resiliency in People."
subtitle: #43 Sage Askin "Longevity Needs Resiliency in People."
summary:
The legendary Sage Asking from Askin Global Land and Livestock joins me in the Eastes Media studio for a sit down, face to face episode.
Sage and I had spent most of the day together riding around on the ranch, looking at my cows and generally touring around the Red Hills.

https://www.askinlandandlivestock.com/

https://www.facebook.com/askinlandandlivestock/
